lebrutton-text.name: Print Text
lebrutton-text.description:
Prints <cy>lebron</c> upon clicking <cc>le Lebrutton</c> <cb>(only in the editor!!!)</c>
<c-303030>also copies <c-4d4d00>lebron</c> to clipboard but that's <c-505050>not</c> only in the editor</c>

lebrutton-sound.name: Play Sound
lebrutton-sound.description: Plays the <cj>"The John Jay" vine sound</c> upon clicking <cc>le Lebrutton</c>

lebrutton-pic.name: Show Picture
lebrutton-pic.description: Shows the <co>sunshine picture</c> upon clicking <cc>le Lebrutton</c>

general-main-menu.name: Main Menu Button
general-main-menu.enable-if-description: How would you use le Lebrutton if you have no keyrings?

general-pause-menu.name: Pause Menu Button
general-pause-menu.enable-if-description: How would you use le Lebrutton if you have no keyrings?

general-editor-pause-menu.name: Editor Pause Menu Button
general-editor-pause-menu.description: <cg>Enables</c>/<cr>disables</c> <cc>le Lebrutton</c> in the editor pause menu
general-editor-pause-menu.enable-if-description: How would you use le Lebrutton if you have no keyrings?

keyring-toggle-repeat.name: Toggle Repeat
keyring-toggle-repeat.description: Custom ~Keybinds~ Keyrings is [stupid](user:10929123), so you need to manually set if the keyring <cf>repeats</c> when you hold it down or <cr>not</c> here
keyring-toggle-repeat.enable-if-description: You have no keyrings, why would you toggle this?

keyring-wide-title.name: Go to game settings to change keyrings!!!
keyring-wide-title.enable-if-description: Don't listen!!! No keyrings - nothing to open!
